rows.label: qev027001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah! You there! [ST:gender p1=Mr. p2=Ms. ] BLADE, yes? This may seem like a
chance meeting, but I assure you it is not, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0002
rows.name: Clearly, you are fated to to to hear me out, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0003
rows.name:
This is a deeply serious matter to us, okay?
So before you say anything, I'm going to start talking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0004
rows.name:
The short short version is that the world really is a
dangerous place, isn't it? Yes. So so dangerous.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0005
rows.name:
Especially recently, yes? It's gotten to the point where a
person can't even step outside to do maintenance work,
hasn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0006
rows.name: Or or like right now, as we're out here talking...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0007
rows.name: Have a look above us, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0008
rows.name:
We could be minding our business, working in an
open spot like this, and then BLAM! ...Yes? Blam?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0009
rows.name:
Fourteen people have already been killed, right?
It's far past the point where we can ignore this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0010
rows.name:
And it's not like we don't know who's responsible, yes?
As I'm sure you've guessed, it has to be the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0011
rows.name:
We were supposed to have chased the last of them out
of the area, but but there are still stragglers, it seems?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0012
rows.name:
There's only one reason I can think of for these
senseless attacks...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0013
rows.name:
It's a mix of spite against the Ma-non they couldn't
enslave and the humans they couldn't defeat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0014
rows.name:
And I can't forgive that, can I? It makes me really really
really mad. So mad. So so mad![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0015
rows.name: If you feel the same, I'd like you to help me, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0016
rows.name:
You should go find those Ganglion survivors and beat
them up, yes? Beat them up a lot, even?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev027001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bihabba about the scale of this Ganglion force.

rows.label: qev027001_JNK0020
rows.name: Doubt

rows.label: qev027001_SEL0021
rows.name: Question whether the Ganglion are truly responsible.

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hrm... That's a reasonable question, isn't it?
But it's also a hard one to answer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0018
rows.name:
We can at least be sure that it isn't overly large,
maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0019
rows.name:
A big squad wouldn't bother sneaking around sniping
people, right? They'd just march on the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0020
rows.name:
Their tactics are proof that they don't have that kind of
of of manpower to spare, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0021
rows.name:
Er, what? How is that not clear?
And why would you doubt me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0022
rows.name:
It's because of you humans that this area is so so so
peaceful, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0023
rows.name:
Who would think to do this kind of of cowardly crime
but the Ganglion?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0024
rows.name:
I hope you'll stop asking silly questions and help me
out already, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now that we've established that, I'd like you to start
by tracking down their hideout, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0026
rows.name:
Sadly, nobody thought to record the direction from
which these shots have been fired and so on.
Forensics should have been more thorough, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0027
rows.name: Oh, is that all you need?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0028
rows.name:
BWAUGH! D-don't just jump into a conversation like
that, all right? Also, wait—you're alive?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0029
rows.name:
Er, of course I am? True, I was hurt rather badly—
but as you can see, I'm still here, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0030
rows.name:
I'm also mad enough to to to spit. Who just shoots a
person out of the blue? A jerk, right?
A jerk who you should go beat up a lot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0031
rows.name: So you remember the direction the attack came from?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0032
rows.name:
Well, I was shot in the right side of my back, yes?
So then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0033
rows.name: the shooter would have been north of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0034
rows.name:
There was a fair bit of percussive force to the shot,
but I wasn't burned to a crisp or anything, was I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0035
rows.name:
Which means the beam was extremely focused.
A precision sniper round, perhaps? That suggests it
was fired from a considerable distance, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0036
rows.name:
And based on direction and distance...that would
place the shooter somewhere in Primordia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0037
rows.name:
...Oof. I think I need to lay down.
All this talking has me a little...dizzy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0038
rows.name:
You go get rest, okay? We've got a good lead on the
enemy now, so so don't worry. Oh, and remember to
eat lots of pizza for strength, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0039
rows.name:
By the time you've had dinner and a nap, this whole
mess will be over. After all, I've got an ace BLADE on
the job, don't I?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0040
rows.name:
...Er, I DO have an ace BLADE on the case, right?
Please? Because I really need you to head north into
Primordia and investigate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0041
rows.name: Did you decide to help me out, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0042
rows.name:
I want you to search for whoever's sniping at us from
north of here in Primordia, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0043
rows.name:
You're already involved at this point, so you might as
well see it through, yes? Nobody likes a quitter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0044
rows.name: Do this, and Heradot’s ghost will finally know peace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0045
rows.name:
Er, sorry. Did I say ghost? No. Not ghost. Not dead.
I mean she'll be happy wherever it is that she's
presently recovering! ...Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0046
rows.name:
Now, go go go! Get out in Primordia and start
investigating already, okay?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0047
rows.name: Really, what is the world coming to these days?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0048
rows.name:
We Ma-non just want to live easy, free, peaceful lives,
don't we? Of course we go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027001_MSG0049
rows.name:
We don't need anyone else coming in and ruining that,
right?[ST:wait ]
